name: Messy Animal - Pet Vet Care and dress up puppy and kitty
name_original: Messy Animal - Pet Vet Care and dress up puppy and kitty
description:
Messy Animal - Pet Vet Care and dress up puppy and kitty

After a long run on the blossomed fields to catch those beautiful butterflies... what do you think? this cute puppy and Kitte got himself quite an injury. But no worries, a special care made with LOVE will fix everything. Go on and help him feel better and have blast playing this fun vet care game.
***Features***
-the cutest puppy
-awesome vet tools to diagnose his illness
-treatments to make the puppy feel better
-the cutest pet outfits and accessories
-Puppy An kitte prepare to lots of Dresses and Cap.

Download now this amazing Games
